official_title: A bill to prohibit the payment of any Federal funds to or for the benefit of any entity which provides abortion counseling to minors without the consent of their parents or guardians.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Prohibits funding of any entity which provides abortion services or counseling to persons under the age of eighteen without the consent of their parents or guardians.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the payment of any Federal funds to or for the benefit of any entity which provides abortion counseling to minors without the consent of their parents or guardians.
